code: import apiConfig from"../../config/apiConfig";import{apiBaseURL,profitAndLossReportActionType,toastType}from"../../constants";import requestParam from"../../shared/requestParam";import{addToast}from"./toastAction";import{setLoading}from"./loadingAction";import{setTotalRecord}from"./totalRecordAction";export const fetchProfitAndLossReports=function(){let filter=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let isLoading=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:true;return async dispatch=>{if(isLoading){dispatch(setLoading(true));}let url=apiBaseURL.PROFIT_AND_LOSS_REPORT;if(!_.isEmpty(filter)&&(filter.page||filter.pageSize||filter.search||filter.order_By||filter.created_at)){url+=requestParam(filter,null,null,null,url);}apiConfig.get(url).then(response=>{dispatch({type:profitAndLossReportActionType.FETCH_PROFIT_AND_LOSS,payload:response.data.data});if(isLoading){dispatch(setLoading(false));}}).catch(_ref=>{let{response}=_ref;dispatch(addToast({text:response.data.message,type:toastType.ERROR}));});};};
